user.title: Set up FanSync BLE
user.description: Select your fan from the list if discovered, or enter its BLE address manually. If nothing appears, ensure Bluetooth is available and the fan is powered on and nearby.

error.no_devices_found: No FanSync devices discovered. Make sure Bluetooth is enabled, the fan is on and within range, then try again.
error.bluetooth_unavailable: Bluetooth is unavailable in this Home Assistant instance. Ensure the host has a working Bluetooth adapter or use a Bluetooth Proxy.
